actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to require the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to regulate certain cash markets, such as the National Cheese Exchange, until the Commission determines that the market do not establish reference points for other transactions, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Cheese Exchange Oversight and Improvement Act of 1997

summary.text: National Cheese Exchange Oversight and Improvement Act of 1997 - Amends the Commodity Exchange Act to direct the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to regulate a concentrated cash market (as defined by this Act), including the National Cheese Exchange in Green Bay, Wisconsin, until the Commission determines that the market is not functioning as a reference price for off-market transactions of the commodity being traded on such market.

titles.title: National Cheese Exchange Oversight and Improvement Act of 1997

A bill to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to require the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to regulate certain cash markets, such as the National Cheese Exchange, until the Commission determines that the market do not establish reference points for other transactions, and for other purposes.
